context: Hello! Are you a sci-fi fan? I have been looking for some good sci-fi movies. if not, any good comedies?
If you are in the mood for a comedy? The Other Woman (2014) had me rolling on the floor Sci Fi, I loved The Martian (2015)
I have been meaning to see The Martian (2015)
Oh, you should There's another one about Mars 2036 Origin Unknown (2018) you might want to check out
Have you seen Interstellar (2014) ? I have heard it was a good, cerebral sci-fi flick.
resp: Yes, I saw Interstellar (2014) . It was brainy.
